name: NEET Girl Date Night
description:
Hi there, I'm Hitsuji. NEET Girl Date Night is a small visual novel I made of my OC, Kara Eklund. I hope you enjoy your date with her!

Download the OST on bandcamp!
NEET Girl Date Night OST

Buy Kara's shirt at the Dismiss Yourself shop!
Dismiss Yourself Shop

Other official NGDN Merch is at:
https://hitsujigoods.com/
